main.name: Ali Cankal
main.bio: Dynamic Technology Leader | Software Developer | Passionate Coach/Mentor I’m a self-starter and friendly professional with over 25+ years of expertise in software development, IT, project management, and leadership. With a proven record of success, I thrive in both independent and collaborative settings. I embrace challenges and take pride in coaching and mentoring individuals to achieve their full potential. Key Skills & Strengths Academic Excellence:   - Expert in marking academic assignments to ensure competency and quality.   - 100% success rate: Guided 350+ learners to complete their apprenticeship programs, with 99% achieving their goals on their first attempt. - Leadership & Coaching:   - Passionate about coaching individuals to excel, meet KPIs, and improve business objectives.   - Strong communication, mentoring, and leadership skills, backed by high resilience and a positive attitude.   - Experience mentoring teams toward timely and successful technical development milestones. - Software Development Expertise:   - Extensive experience across all stages of the SDLC, from development to operations.   - Skilled in Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Scrumban, Waterfall).   - High-level troubleshooting, analytical problem-solving, and technical investigation skills. - Customer-Centric Focus:   - Proven ability to exceed expectations in high-pressure environments.   - Exceptional written and verbal communication skills at all organizational levels. - Versatility in Technology:   - Comfortable adapting to and mastering new technologies quickly.   - Expertise in creating bespoke solutions, such as a custom-built CRM application using web technologies. Key Achievements - Empowering Success:   - Successfully coached individuals to achieve their goals, transitioning into professional software developers. - Driving Business Impact:   - Consistently met KPIs and delivered results aligned with business objectives.   - Developed a streamlined process to enhance team productivity and communication. - Delivering Innovation:   - Designed and implemented a bespoke CRM application to improve efficiency.   - Provided tailored mentoring to colleagues and customers, enhancing team success. - Technical Mastery:   - Achieved swift case resolution through expert diagnosis and out-of-the-box problem-solving.   - Delivered exceptional responsiveness and productivity standards in Agile environments. With a passion for coaching and a customer-centric mindset, I am eager to bring value to new challenges. Let’s connect and discuss how I can help your team or business thrive!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the Let's Learn family!

education.description: Computing and IT skills have become fundamental to the way we live, work, socialise and play. This degree course opens up the world of technology and an array of exciting careers in a wide range of sectors – from finance, government, health, education and the ‘Third Sector', to business, gaming and commerce. You may want to become a confident user and manager of information technologies; administer and manage network or database systems; or develop new software solutions to meet specific market or organisational needs. The BSc (Honours) Computing and IT offers a variety of study pathways such as networking, professional practice or solutions development, and the opportunity to specialise in software development or digital technologies. If you’re currently employed, there are valuable opportunities to incorporate work-related learning that builds on your existing role and equips you for new responsibilities.

Trained to be a DM Pro by covering the below topics; Introduction to Digital Marketing Content Marketing Social Media Marketing SEO (Search Engine Optimization) Paid Search (PPC) with Google Ads YouTube and Display Advertising Email Marketing Website Optimization Analytics with Google Analytics Digital Marketing Strategy
Various programming languages including Pascal, Delphi, Assembly, C, VB, SQL.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developing the next generation AI SaaS with firevision to save lives.

work.title: Degree Digital Learning Consultant
work.description: I support the learners through the Digital Technology & Solutions Degree and Apprenticeship with Roehampton University. I also mark the module end assignments on their term modules, mainly on Software and DevOps.

work.title: SD Mentor in AI & ML
work.description: MentorIn... : For empowering the next generation of AI professionals

work.title: Digital Consultant
work.description: •	I work as a freelance consultant to improve companies’ IT processes and their interaction with technology. •	I work with several companies’ IT systems to improve their business by %35. •	I create a better business process for customers and increase profitability by %20 with Lean Six Sigma approaches. •	I develop a Java-based CRM application to increase companies’ business with MySQL DB. •	I develop a selection of web pages to increase customer business by %20. •	I set the SEO for companies to improve their marketplace by %10 within their sector.

work.title: Software Developer Digital Learning Consultant
work.description: •	Be responsible for coaching and mentoring a group of learners working towards the successful and timely achievement of their Software development apprenticeship programme within a digital environment.

work.title: Software Developer Skills Coach
work.description: •	To coach, mentor and assess groups of learners towards the achievement of their programme. •	Work with the Regional Delivery Manager to meet the key business strategies and objectives. •	To support the learners to apply their newly found skills and knowledge to their day-to-day roles. •	To provide guidance and support for all components of the Software Developer programme for a caseload of learners.  •	To retain learners engaged in the programme and manage their learning and achievement in line with the targets and objectives agreed in their Commitment Statement. •	To conduct regular meetings between the employer and learner to demonstrate formal progress and planning of progression. •	To provide an outstanding experience for both the learner and the employer. •	To travel and complete assessment of all related Assessment Organisations’(Awarding Body) assignments. •	Identify, develop and deliver business opportunities. •	Manage a targeted number of learners. •	Undertake additional projects and activities to meet the needs of the Delivery team and learners as required. •	Support learners holistically across a variety of modules, specifically helping them apply their skills to their immediate job roles. •	Build good working relationships with employers, line managers and mentors. •	Support the learners through the Summative Portfolio, Synoptic Project, Knowledge Modules and Interview with Assessment Organisation. •	Supporting workplace managers with requirements for a learner reference. •	Ensure that programmes are delivered in accordance with the organisations’ Equal Opportunities and Health and Safety Policies. •	Continuous development and meeting the KPIs to grow my team and my business in the education sector.

work.title: Rollout Training Consultant
work.description: •	I worked as a rollout and training consultant to implement a new MB application to be used in their UK dealership network. •	I was responsible for training out the XPP/Autoline integration to Mercedes-Benz Passenger Car Autoline aftersales users in a classroom environment  •	I was also responsible for on-the-job workstation coaching to Mercedes-Benz Passenger Car Autoline aftersales users. •	I was supporting the retailer/dealer aftersales teams post-go-live. Managing query and issue resolution

work.title: IT Project Manager
work.description: •	My main duty is to manage, develop and implement a new local cloud software for the international IT sector. •	I manage to develop new software to increase company revenue by %10 with PRINCE 2 Agile. •	I report regularly to stakeholders about the cloud storage sector and IT with charts and presentations. •	I serve as Scrum Master in the project to improve the development life cycle. •	I collaborate with the sales team to increase international sales. •	I liaise with international customers to improve relationships for future businesses. •	I work with network engineers to improve customers’ day to day business. •	I develop Java applications to improve company IP camera revenue by %15. •	I add an extra %15 profit to the authentication software sale.

work.title: Technical Software Support
work.description: •	I provide technical escalation for frontline support to ensure all customer calls are accurately investigated and ensure the cause and the symptom of problems are identified and resolved to meet customer satisfaction. •	I analyse and resolve complex product issues, using analytical, technical or programming skills to meet SLA by code reading and manipulating. •	I respond with empathy to customers, dealing with their needs, and acknowledging their operational pressures and deadlines.  •	I work closely with both colleagues and customers to guide, advise and coach them to resolve their issues and problems with presentation and documentation. •	I contribute to knowledgebase documentation to improve internal and external knowledge of the dealer management systems by %10. •	I report issues and recommend process improvements to other teams to minimise queries and problems arising and to increase customer satisfaction levels. •	Day to day, I complete the system monitoring task to improve system performance. •	I analyse and read KCML programming code to investigate or resolve critical system issues. •	I collaborate with third-party software companies to implement their products and new modules to customers’ systems to increase revenue. •	I lease with third-party business intelligence companies to export the data to improve customer business. •	I investigate and resolve the data transfer issues in pressured environments to help company profitability.

work.title: Language Tutor
work.description: - I teach the Turkish language to professionals to help their daily communication skills in their business. - I prepare tests and learning materials within the college teaching procedures. - I interact with students in a group or on 1-2-1 bases. - I present samples and exercises to the classroom to improve their knowledge of the language.

work.title: Web Designer and IT support
work.description: - I communicate with one of the UK’s leading Overseas property agencies to open a new office in Turkey. - I manage a process to create a new property sale organisation in Turkey. - I create web pages for international property advertisements to increase local developers’ property sales and revenue by more than 60%.

work.title: CAD Administrator
work.description: - I have been the lead person to create scaled road closure drawings within highway agency requirements for local councils for road works. - I organise and manage the team of people and council to plan road closer process for highway agency road works. - I use the CAD drawing application to create documentation for highway agencies.

work.title: Software Engineer /Electronic test technician
work.description: - I design a GUI application to control the lighting system in a tower building from a PC with OSS 2000 application. - I helped to reduce the lighting cost of the building by 30%. - I assist with the design and development of a Graphical User Interface project which resulted in extra sales and revenue

testimonials.text: Ali is professional, focused, determined, and yet remains friendly, and approachable. He understands the KSBs for L6 DTS and coaches apprentices to achieve their goals.
